title: Google Trends Scraper
description: Extract Google Trends data including interest over time, geographic interest, related topics, and related queries.

searchTerms.title: Search terms
searchTerms.description: List of search terms to scrape from Google Trends.

startUrls.title: Google Trends URLs
startUrls.description: Direct Google Trends explore URLs with pre-applied filters.

geo.title: Geographic region
geo.description: Two-letter country code (e.g., US, GB, DE) or leave empty for worldwide.

timeRange.title: Time range
timeRange.description: Predefined time range for the search.

category.title: Category
category.description: Google Trends category ID. Use 0 for all.

cookies.title: Session Cookies (JSON)
cookies.description: Pre-authenticated cookies from trends.google.com to bypass CAPTCHA. Export cookies using browser extension like 'Cookie-Editor' and paste the JSON array here.

isMultiple.title: Multiple terms (comma-separated)
isMultiple.description: Treat commas in search terms as separate terms.

maxItems.title: Max items
maxItems.description: Maximum terms to process. 0 = no limit.

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Use RESIDENTIAL proxy for best results.
